title: [GAMEPLAY] Snowday Singed Backing Sound Bug
body:
When backing with snowday singed (possibly other skins) his backing animation sound is doubled and can be heard across the map and not locally.

1.Play Snowday singed.  teleport back to base
2a.listen for the backing sound in different places on the map
2b.Listen closely and you can hear 2 backing animation sounds on top of each other.

I've seen this in at least 3 games that I've played.

replies.body: Yup I've got the same issue with Snow Day Singed. Totally how you described it.

Hey Hardcor - 

Thanks for the awesome bug report! We're aware of the issue and are investigating!
